quote: I can tell you that solitudeIs not all exaltation, inner spaceWhere the soul breaths and work can be done.Solitude exposes the nerve,Raises up ghosts.The past, never at rest, flows through it.
quote_letters: I CAN TELL YOU THAT SOLITUDEIS NOT ALL EXALTATION INNER SPACEWHERE THE SOUL BREATHS AND WORK CAN BE DONESOLITUDE EXPOSES THE NERVERAISES UP GHOSTSTHE PAST NEVER AT REST FLOWS THROUGH IT
